name: Real Soccer Game - Play dream soccer league, win cup and become lords of soccer by BULKY SPORTS
name_original: Real Soccer Game - Play dream soccer league, win cup and become lords of soccer by BULKY SPORTS
description:
Real soccer for "UEFA EURO Cup 2016" Download for Free.

Soccer is hot in Europe and the big game has arrived...!!!
Its time to show love for soccer.

Play unlimited soccer matches.
Win matches and qualify to play with big teams.
Have good scores to earn virtual currency.
Unlock tournaments and become a soccer super star.

Game is designed to have 4 playing modes
-Quick Match
-Knockout
-World cup
-Leagues

Game support multiple languages for players from all over the world

-English
-Spanish
-French
-Chinese
-Italian
-Japanese
-Dutch
-Russian

Disclaimer:
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.


Feedback:
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at ask.bulkysports@gmail.com
